title: The Best Coach Bags to Shop For Fall
description: Few designer brands satiate our love for a quality handbag quite like Coach. The heritage label never ceases to amaze us with its wide array of accessories that range in everything from compact shoulder bags and spacious bucket bags to backpacks and crossbody styles. In the spirit of the new season, Coach just debuted a brand-new selection of styles that offer upgrades on classic fan favorites - and just in time for fall, no less. Ahead, we curated a guide to the best Coach bags that are worth splurging on this season, with styles that include everything from carryall totes for everyday wear to cute shoulder bags and even a few new pieces that you'll definitely want to snap up before they inevitably sell out. There are backpacks that double as the ultimate travel accessory, cool camera bags that are compact yet practical, and a number of Coach handbags that are now available to shop in a variety of vibrant, seasonal color options. If it was up to us, we'd buy them all (and probably will). Keep reading to see our picks for this season's trendiest Coach bags, and scoop up your new favorite designer accessory while it's still in stock. Related: 18 Chic Bags Hiding on Amazon For Under $100
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Perfect for every day and beyond!
text: CoachCoachWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. The heritage label never ceases to amaze us with its wide array of accessories that range in everything from compact shoulder bags and spacious bucket bags to backpacks and crossbody styles. In the spirit of the new season, Coach just debuted a brand-new selection of styles that offer upgrades on classic fan favorites — and just in time for fall, no less. Ahead, we curated a guide to the best Coach bags that are worth splurging on this season, with styles that include everything from carryall totes for everyday wear to cute shoulder bags and even a few new pieces that you'll definitely want to snap up before they inevitably sell out. There are backpacks that double as the ultimate travel accessory, cool camera bags that are compact yet practical, and a number of Coach handbags that are now available to shop in a variety of vibrant, seasonal color options. If it was up to us, we'd buy them all (and probably will). Keep reading to see our picks for this season's trendiest Coach bags, and scoop up your new favorite designer accessory while it's still in stock. coach.comBest Black BagCoach Swinger 20 ($195) Get yourself this elegant, easy Coach handbag, and thank us later. It's the perfect going out bag; it goes with everything, and fits all your essentials, with little room for much else. Plus, it's a squishy and flexible style to throw into your carry-on bag if you're traveling.coach.comBest Trendy BagCoach Tabby Crossbody in Silver Metallic ($275) If you're looking for a bag that's trendy enough to wear this season yet still functional enough to keep in your closet for the longterm, you can't go wrong with investing in the Tabby Crossbody, which is one of many styles included in Coach's glitzy shine collection. The statement accessory boasts a vibrant silver coloring that's completely unique and bound to elevate any outfit with a more futuristic flair.coach.comBest Shoulder BagCoach Tabby Shoulder Bag 20 With Quilting ($350) Sometimes, you just want a polished, goes with everything bag. And in that case, we highly recommend this textured shoulder handle bag from Coach — one of the brand's newest styles for fall. The layered accessory looks so elegant, and also has a useful interior zippered pocket, as well as a flexible chain handle.coach.comBest Coach Tote BagCoach Willow Tote ($350) Everyone needs a great tote bag in their life, and this deep accessory from Coach is so useful. You can fit all of your daily essentials inside, even larger items like an iPad or lunchbox. Whether you're traveling, going to work or school, or just running around, you're definitely going to want this elegant tote bag at your disposal.click.linksynergy.comBest Bucket BagCoach Willow Bucket Bag ($350) A bucket bag is the ultimate carryall, and this season, we're crushing on this classic white style from Coach. The inside has two compartments, so it'll be easy to keep track of all your stuff. We love the bag's versatile and sleek coloring, but it also comes in coated canvas and brass black.coach.comBest Soft BagCoach Soft Tabby Shoulder Bag ($450) You can never go wrong with a timeless shoulder bag, and we've got this sophisticated style at the top of our fall wish lists. The compact bag is lightweight and so cool but it also comes with a longer strap, making it a versatile option that you can convert, as needed.coach.comBest Leather BagCoach Tabby Shoulder Bag 26 ($450) This bag is made from a mix of Spazzolato leather and refined calf leather with two different detachable straps to adjust the height of the bag and the options for styling it. The shape is a modern revamp of the archival 1970s Coach Tabby, and the lustrous, smooth leather, coupled with the signature gold hardware, make for a luxe touch.PS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Quilted BagCoach Times Square Tabby Shoulder Bag With Quilting ($495) For something with a bit more texture, go for this quilted shoulder bag from Coach. The accessory is crafted from a Nappa leather material that's soft to the touch and designed to last. We love its compact frame — which is deceptively spacious — and the fact that it's available in four versatile colorways for fall: black, chalk, merlot, and navy. See the full product details in our review of the Coach Times Square Tabby Shoulder Bag. Editor Quote: "The Coach Times Square Tabby Shoulder Bag is ideal for those on the go who can't live without their essentials. It's understated enough to take to work, but it has glam elements that make it perfect for date night or dressier occasions. It's the perfect size to use as a chic daily bag that can fit your necessities and keep them organized." — Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, Shoppingcoach.comBest Classic BagCoach Tabby Shoulder Bag 26 With Quilting ($550) You can't go wrong with a classic shoulder bag, and we're so into the look of this new quilted style from Coach. It's a great compact size that's perfect for carrying any smaller essentials like a credit card holder or travel lipstick. We also love its sophisticated and versatile gold hardware, which teams beautifully with the accessory's elevated texturing.Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping, where she reviews trending products and compiles helpful shopping guides. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Few designer brands satiate our love for a quality handbag quite like Coach. The heritage label never ceases to amaze us with its wide array of accessories that range in everything from compact shoulder bags and spacious bucket bags to backpacks and crossbody styles. In the spirit of the new season, Coach just debuted a brand-new selection of styles that offer upgrades on classic fan favorites — and just in time for fall, no less.

Ahead, we curated a guide to the best Coach bags that are worth splurging on this season, with styles that include everything from carryall totes for everyday wear to cute shoulder bags and even a few new pieces that you'll definitely want to snap up before they inevitably sell out. There are backpacks that double as the ultimate travel accessory, cool camera bags that are compact yet practical, and a number of Coach handbags that are now available to shop in a variety of vibrant, seasonal color options.

If it was up to us, we'd buy them all (and probably will). Keep reading to see our picks for this season's trendiest Coach bags, and scoop up your new favorite designer accessory while it's still in stock.

Best Black Bag

Coach Swinger 20 ($195)

Get yourself this elegant, easy Coach handbag, and thank us later. It's the perfect going out bag; it goes with everything, and fits all your essentials, with little room for much else. Plus, it's a squishy and flexible style to throw into your carry-on bag if you're traveling.

Best Trendy Bag

Coach Tabby Crossbody in Silver Metallic ($275)

If you're looking for a bag that's trendy enough to wear this season yet still functional enough to keep in your closet for the longterm, you can't go wrong with investing in the Tabby Crossbody, which is one of many styles included in Coach's glitzy shine collection. The statement accessory boasts a vibrant silver coloring that's completely unique and bound to elevate any outfit with a more futuristic flair.

Best Shoulder Bag

Coach Tabby Shoulder Bag 20 With Quilting ($350)

Sometimes, you just want a polished, goes with everything bag. And in that case, we highly recommend this textured shoulder handle bag from Coach — one of the brand's newest styles for fall. The layered accessory looks so elegant, and also has a useful interior zippered pocket, as well as a flexible chain handle.

Best Coach Tote Bag

Coach Willow Tote ($350)

Everyone needs a great tote bag in their life, and this deep accessory from Coach is so useful. You can fit all of your daily essentials inside, even larger items like an iPad or lunchbox. Whether you're traveling, going to work or school, or just running around, you're definitely going to want this elegant tote bag at your disposal.

Best Bucket Bag

Coach Willow Bucket Bag ($350)

A bucket bag is the ultimate carryall, and this season, we're crushing on this classic white style from Coach. The inside has two compartments, so it'll be easy to keep track of all your stuff. We love the bag's versatile and sleek coloring, but it also comes in coated canvas and brass black.

Best Soft Bag

Coach Soft Tabby Shoulder Bag ($450)

You can never go wrong with a timeless shoulder bag, and we've got this sophisticated style at the top of our fall wish lists. The compact bag is lightweight and so cool but it also comes with a longer strap, making it a versatile option that you can convert, as needed.

Best Leather Bag

Coach Tabby Shoulder Bag 26 ($450)

This bag is made from a mix of Spazzolato leather and refined calf leather with two different detachable straps to adjust the height of the bag and the options for styling it. The shape is a modern revamp of the archival 1970s Coach Tabby, and the lustrous, smooth leather, coupled with the signature gold hardware, make for a luxe touch.

Best Quilted Bag

Coach Times Square Tabby Shoulder Bag With Quilting ($495)

For something with a bit more texture, go for this quilted shoulder bag from Coach. The accessory is crafted from a Nappa leather material that's soft to the touch and designed to last. We love its compact frame — which is deceptively spacious — and the fact that it's available in four versatile colorways for fall: black, chalk, merlot, and navy. See the full product details in our review of the Coach Times Square Tabby Shoulder Bag.

Editor Quote: "The Coach Times Square Tabby Shoulder Bag is ideal for those on the go who can't live without their essentials. It's understated enough to take to work, but it has glam elements that make it perfect for date night or dressier occasions. It's the perfect size to use as a chic daily bag that can fit your necessities and keep them organized." — Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, Shopping

Best Classic Bag

Coach Tabby Shoulder Bag 26 With Quilting ($550)

You can't go wrong with a classic shoulder bag, and we're so into the look of this new quilted style from Coach. It's a great compact size that's perfect for carrying any smaller essentials like a credit card holder or travel lipstick. We also love its sophisticated and versatile gold hardware, which teams beautifully with the accessory's elevated texturing.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping, where she reviews trending products and compiles helpful shopping guides. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
